label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_024
content:
## 2026-01-25 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster/usage: REQUESTS req | p50: 12ms p95: 45ms p99: 78ms | err: 0.2% (5 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/node/utilization: REQUESTS req | p50: 8ms p95: 22ms p99: 35ms | err: 0.1% (3 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/rebalance/status: REQUESTS req | p50: 10ms p95: 30ms p99: 55ms | err: 0.3% (7 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/compaction/run: REQUESTS req | p50: 9ms p95: 25ms p99: 50ms | err: 0.2% (4 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/io/metrics: REQUESTS req | p50: 11ms p95: 40ms p99: 70ms | err: 0.1% (2 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/metadata/db: REQUESTS req | p50: 7ms p95: 20ms p99: 33ms | err: 0.1% (2 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/quota/status: REQUESTS req | p50: 6ms p95: 18ms p99: 29ms | err: 0.1% (2 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /storage/ingest/metrics: REQUESTS req | p50: 8ms p95: 24ms p99: 40ms | err: 0.2% (4 errors) | success: 99.8%
- /storage/reliability/status: REQUESTS req | p50: 10ms p95: 35ms p99: 60ms | err: 0.3% (6 errors) | success: 99.7%
- /storage/backup/verify: REQUESTS req | p50: 9ms p95: 28ms p99: 48ms | err: 0.1% (2 errors) | success: 99.9%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-16: CPU 80% | Mem 86% | Disk 98% | Conns: 120 | Net: 8.7/7.9 Mbps
- stor-b-04: CPU 70% | Mem 78% | Disk 97% | Conns: 115 | Net: 7.3/6.9 Mbps
- stor-c-23: CPU 63% | Mem 74% | Disk 96% | Conns: 102 | Net: 6.3/6.1 Mbps
- meta-02: CPU 75% | Mem 94% | Disk 89% | Conns: 98 | Net: 4.1/3.7 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-storage: active 85 | idle 10 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 0 | max 100 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-db: active 40 | idle 8 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 9ms
- pool-api: active 25 | idle 5 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 30 | avg_wait 7ms
- pool-cache: active 15 | idle 3 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 20 | avg_wait 5ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92% | Bandwidth: 3.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 1,250,000

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] disk_failure on stor-b-04: disk rebuild completed in 6.8 hours
- [WARNING] node_unhealthy on stor-c-23: 3 unhealthy OSDs
- [INFO] network_drops on meta-02: 19 drops
- [INFO] scrub_errors reduced from 44 to 28
- [INFO] pending_compactions decreased from 130 to 104
- [INFO] disk busy eased to 92.2%
- [INFO] restore drill executed for tenant namespace; RTO 48 min
- [INFO] rebalance completed 14 jobs; skew index 1.03; hottest node 98.2%
- [INFO] overnight compaction run; 2776 compactions; 181.2 CPU hours
- [INFO] metadata database size 1267 GB; QPS 78,000; cache hit 88.6%
- [INFO] backup verification: 48 snapshots taken and verified; 0 failures; avg verify 39 min
- [INFO] tenant quota: 6 over quota; 33 soft limit hits; 5 hard blocks; largest tenant 513 TB
- [INFO] ingestion: 146 TB in; 145 TB egress; 53M objects; avg object size 92 KB; 9 hot partitions
- [INFO] storage efficiency: replication factor 3; erasure coding 33%; compression ratio 1.74; dedupe ratio 1.02; garbage 7.7%; tombstones 4.9%
- [INFO] reliability: 1 disk failure; 1 disk rebuild; 6.8 hr rebuild; 1 node restart; 3 unhealthy OSDs; 28 scrub errors
- [INFO] maintenance: no firmware updates or kernel patches; network drops 19; audit log 88 GB

### Deployments & Changes
- Extended overnight compaction reduced pending from 130 to 104; scrub errors fell from 44 to 28; disk busy eased to 92.2%
- Restore drill executed for regulated tenant namespace; achieved 48-minute RTO and validated object counts against manifests
- Rebalance completed 14 jobs, bringing skew index to 1.03 and reducing hottest-node utilization to 98.2%
- Disk failure on a mid-tier node replaced; rebuild completed in 6.8 hours and unhealthy OSD count remained at 3

### Events
- Extended overnight compaction reduced pending from 130 to 104; scrub errors fell from 44 to 28 and disk busy eased to 92.2%
- Restore drill executed for regulated tenant namespace; achieved 48-minute RTO and validated object counts against manifests
- Rebalance completed 14 jobs, bringing skew index to 1.03 and reducing hottest-node utilization to 98.2%
- Disk failure on a mid-tier node replaced; rebuild completed in 6.8 hours and unhealthy OSD count remained at 3

### On-Call
- Shift: Elliot Z. 6 pages. 12 tickets. Status: Stable; improvements after compaction surge and rebalance. Still near 90% utilization; onboarding freeze remains, and tenant churn reduction actions are tracked
